ygData.subject: RE: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: That is a very good point, to make out. I agree that some servers may be different. See I played on Tarew Marr up to lv 36 at that current level my research
ygData.messageBody:
That is a very good point, to make out. I agree that some servers may be
different. See I played on Tarew Marr up to lv 36 at that current level my
research should have been around 185 max if you followed the traditional
lv*5+5=Max for casters this is such. And there melee states are lv*3+3=max.
Anyway. My research after much help from friends and working I had a
research of 191 with the cost of many runes and the like of words. So this
with what has been said it seems that there is no cap when you train. The
same goes for Smithing, when you smith they train you to a point then tell
you I can no longer train you fine exp some where else blah blah blah..... I
am not going to post about this after this one until some more hard proof is
found about this. I am sorry if I have caused any convience to anyone. Lets
just get on with Tinkering and see how things go. Again I apologize. And
what is with the servers going down at differnet times. Some conspericy
hmmmmmm.
